title: After We Collided
description: Tessa finds herself struggling with her complicated relationship with Hardin; she faces a dilemma that could change their lives forever.

reviews.text: People who like this movie have a really bad taste. Romance for 12 year old naive girls.
This movie slaps. My favorite part was when she got hit by a car. Dylan Sprouse = the superior brother.
Even worse than its predecessor. Nothing else to say. Terrible, terrible, terrible.
Never saw the first one and after seeing this atrocity, i don't think i ever will.
Still trying to understand what or why this thing is.  What is this.  I don't know.

It's an ok film, not something that you haven't seen before or something that will surprise you...Just by seeing the trailer, you know what you're getting into, a cheesy romantic movie about a kinda toxic relationship.I didn't hate it because in comparison to other films in this genre It's not as bad as them, but It's still that good...

both leads have zero chemistry. It's like watching two siblings kiss and makes me vomit. Also their acting really needs HUGE improvement and I recommend acting classes. Both actors are just pretty faces trying to get in hollywood.
One of my favourite romance movie
